page_info_list.Title: Page 1
page_info_list.Alt text: Ava's not lying; she was rated "Least Lucky Hewani of the Year" by the Mothorian Times six years in a row.

page_info_list.Title: Page 2
page_info_list.Alt text: Ava's the only bat who can make that hat work with that coat.

page_info_list.Title: Page 3
page_info_list.Alt text: Get you a bird who talks about you the way Ackerley talks about quests.

page_info_list.Title: Page 4
page_info_list.Alt text: It's your tiny claws, Ackerley. Impossible to run on those puny things.

page_info_list.Title: Page 5
page_info_list.Alt text: It's too late, Ackerley. She's gone.

page_info_list.Title: Page 6
page_info_list.Alt text: Hate to admit it, but that burler's got way more impressive claws than you do, Ackerley.

page_info_list.Title: Page 7
page_info_list.Alt text: Oh dang, Ackerley laying down those casual character history tidbits. What a tease.

page_info_list.Title: Page 8
page_info_list.Alt text: Come on, lady, mind your own business. Jeez.

page_info_list.Title: Page 9
page_info_list.Alt text: If there's one thing Ava's good at, it's running haphazardly.
